CustomField.formula: Owner.FirstName + " " + Owner.LastName + "-" + Apps_Owner__r.FirstName + " " + Apps_Owner__r.LastName + "-" + BC_Owner__r.FirstName + " " + BC_Owner__r.LastName + "-" + DPS_Owner__r.FirstName + " " + DPS_Owner__r.LastName + "-" + BID_Office_Owner__r.FirstName + " " + BID_Office_Owner__r.LastName
CustomField.label: All Owners
